meanings.sent1: The small boat was so rockable on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: The chair was very comfortable and rockable.
meanings.sent3: The baby's crib was so rockable, it put him to sleep in no time.
meanings.sent4: The hammock between the trees looked incredibly rockable.
meanings.sent5: The gentle waves made the raft feel incredibly rockable.

meanings.sent1: The sturdy chair was rockable for the children to play on.
meanings.sent2: The porch swing was a perfect, rockable spot to relax.
meanings.sent3: The rocking horse was so rockable that even the cat tried to ride it.
meanings.sent4: The old wooden cradle was a rockable reminder of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The smooth, curved base made the chair very rockable.

meanings.sent1: The cradle was rockable with a gentle push.
meanings.sent2: The boat was so light and rockable on the water.
meanings.sent3: The rocking chair was so rockable, it almost rocked on its own.
meanings.sent4: The swing was incredibly rockable, moving with the slightest breeze.
meanings.sent5: The small boat was surprisingly rockable despite its size.
